attributes.action: Force No10 to publish Sue Gray’s report available in full to the general public.
attributes.additional_details: To uphold democracy in British government
attributes.background: For MPs told hold a debate in Parliament in the full report from Sue Gray.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make sure the report into 'partygate' is published in full with the evidence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606960
